title: Michael Christmas "Pleasant Winter"
description:
Boston’s appropriately named Michael Christmas brings us a “Pleasant Winter” for Converse Rubber Tracks’ holiday music EP, Noise To the World 2. “Pleasant Winter” was produced by North Villah and mastered by Grammy-Nominated engineer Mike Bozzi; known for his work with Kendrick Lamar and YG. 

Produced and mixed by: Michael Christmas
Music and Lyrics by: Michael Christmas
Mastered by: Mike Bozzi at Bernie Grundman
